sourcesContent:
import { differenceInCalendarDays, format } from "date-fns"; export default function BookingDate({ checkInDate, checkOutDate }) { const numberOfNights = differenceInCalendarDays(checkOutDate, checkInDate); return (
{numberOfNights} Nights {format(checkInDate, "yyyy-MM-dd")} →{" "} {format(checkOutDate, "yyyy-MM-dd")}
); }
